channel.title: Server help
channel.description: well here is my problem i cannot get pictures i do not have a webcam and for some reason others cant connect to my ip and neither can i 1. i have utorrent filled out with my port 43594 but says port isnt open 2. im allowing the port throught my windows firewall aka named RSPS protocol tcp and port: 43594 3. im trying to portforward but dont know if i have dont it right 4. i can log on my server with 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 If someone can give me a link, teamview or other id really appreciate that and thank you for taking time for reading this i need experienced people if its possible

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Coleman123 Coleman123
item.description:
@Coleman123 wrote:

well here is my problem i cannot get pictures i do not have a webcam and for some reason others cant connect to my ip and neither can i

  1. i have utorrent filled out with my port 43594 but says port isnt open
  2. im allowing the port throught my windows firewall aka named RSPS protocol tcp and port: 43594
  3. im trying to portforward but dont know if i have dont it right
  4. i can log on my server with 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0
    If someone can give me a link, teamview or other id really appreciate that and thank you for taking time for reading this i need experienced people if
    its possible

Read full topic
